languages.text:
Паскаль черпает силу Эсхатоса, получая +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Однако враждебные Адептус Механикус на этот раунд получают +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} против Паскаля и считают его {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}.
languages.original_text: Pascal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 INT and +50% damage, but his Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical hit chance against him, and consider Pascal a priority target.

languages.text:
Pasqal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
However, Adeptus Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against Pasqal and consider him a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this round.
languages.original_text:
Паскаль черпает силу Эсхатоса, получая +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и +50% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Однако враждебные Адептус Механикус на этот раунд получают +10% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} против Паскаля и считают его {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Pascal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 INT and +50% damage for 1 round.
However, Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical hit chance against Pascal and consider him a priority target for this round.

Pasqal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
However, Adeptus Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against Pasqal and consider him a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this round.

languages.text:
Pasqal utiliza el poder de Eschatos. Gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Sin embargo, los enemigos del Adeptus Mechanicus también ganan +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico contra Pasqal y le consideran un {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} durante este asalto.
languages.original_text:
Pasqal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
However, Adeptus Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against Pasqal and consider him a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this round.

traits.locale_text:
Pasqal utiliza el poder de Eschatos. Gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} y +50 % de daño durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Sin embargo, los enemigos Mechanicus también ganan +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico contra Pasqal y le consideran un {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} durante este asalto.

languages.text:
帕斯卡汲取了终焉审判的力量。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
不过，机械修会的所有敌人都会将帕斯卡视为{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，所有对帕斯卡的攻击暴击率提高10%，持续一轮。
languages.original_text:
Pasqal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
However, Adeptus Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against Pasqal and consider him a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this round.

traits.locale_text:
帕斯卡汲取了终焉审判的力量。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点，造成的伤害提高50%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
不过，机械修会的所有敌人都会将帕斯卡视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，所有对帕斯卡的攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}提高10%，持续一轮。

languages.text:
パスカルはエスカトスのパワーを引き出す。彼は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と+50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得る。
しかし帝国技術局の敵も、パスカルに対して+10%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を得て、このターンの間彼を{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}とみなす。
languages.original_text:
Pasqal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
However, Adeptus Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against Pasqal and consider him a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this round.

traits.locale_text:
パスカルはエスカトスのパワーを引き出す。彼は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}と+50%のダメージを得る。
しかし技術局の敵も、パスカルに対して+10%のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}を得て、このターンの間彼を{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}とみなす。

languages.text:
Pasqal stärkt sich mit der Macht des Eschatos. Er erhält für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
„Adeptus Mechanicus“-Feinde erhalten jedoch +10 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} gegen Pasqal und betrachten ihn für diese Runde als {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Pasqal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
However, Adeptus Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against Pasqal and consider him a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this round.

traits.locale_text:
Pascal stärkt sich mit der Macht des Eschatos. Er erlangt +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} und +50 % Schaden für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
Mechanicus-Feinde erlangen außerdem +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}kritische Trefferchance{/g} gegen Pascal und betrachten ihn für diese Runde als {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.

languages.text:
Pasqal puise dans le pouvoir d'Eschatos. Il bénéficie de +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Mais les ennemis de l’Adeptus Mechanicus bénéficient également de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique à Pasqal et le considèrent comme une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} lors de ce round.
languages.original_text:
Pasqal draws on the power of Eschatos. He gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
However, Adeptus Mechanicus enemies also gain +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against Pasqal and consider him a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this round.

traits.locale_text:
Pascal puise dans le pouvoir d'Eschatos. Il bénéficie de +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} et +50 % de dégâts pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Mais les ennemis du Mechanicus bénéficient également de +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique à Pascal et le considèrent comme une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} lors de ce round.
